name: Pug Park (ldrg, shreddingDemon, Troisnyx, Alixxir)
description:
Use your lead and let your dog take you for a walk around the three different parks in this expanded version game where you must try to gather as many treats (bones and bacon) as possible while avoiding obstacles along the way that might slow you down or break your lead and loose your dog resulting in a game over!

Controls

A to Turn left

D to Turn Right

Space bar to jump

This is an extended version of the GMTK 2021 submission - https://ldrg.itch.io/pug-park-gmtk

Contributors

Programmer - Alex Donisthorpe (@AlexDonisthorpe)

Programmer - Philipp Busch - Programmer *

3D models and textures - Ellie Harrodine (@shreddingdemon)

Game/Level Designer & Project Manager - Lucas "GrapefruitChili" Garcia

Composer - Annette "Troisnyx" Singh (@Troisnyx)
